name: Kalopsia
description:
Kalopsia is a fast paced action game where you need to protect the Core at all costs, however the task at hand is quite a challenging one.


Your weapon is truly unique as it can deal a great amount of damage if you use enough geometric cleverness and ingenuity.

Operate the weapon by pressing left click on your mouse 3 times in 3 different spots of the arena.

Be sure to utilize wall running and sliding to kill enemies more effectively.

Keybinds:

Move: WASD

Sprint: Left Shift

Crouch: Left Ctrl

Slide: Left Shift + Left Ctrl

Jump: Space

Add vertex: Left click

Cancel triangle: Right click

The game was made by tailow and danoninoni as a game jam project for the Ludum Dare 50 competition. Link to game on ldjam: https://ldj.am/$28313
